summary:
Microwaves have lengths between 1 meter and 1 millimeter. A millimetre (mm) is a small unit of length in the International System of Units (SI). It is equal to one thousandth of a meter. There are 1000 millimetres in a meter and 10 millimetres in a centimeter. 

One millimetre is also 1000 micrometres or 1 million nanometres. In relation to inches, 1 millimetre is about 0.03937 inches.
title: Millimetre
